text: {{Infobox settlement |official_name = Bodega |settlement_type = census-designated place |other_name = Bodega Corners | image_skyline = |pushpin_map = California |pushpin_label_position = right |pushpin_map_caption = Location within the state of California |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = |subdivision_type1 = State |subdivision_name1 = |subdivision_type2 = County |subdivision_name2 = Sonoma | unit_pref = Imperial | area_footnotes = | area_total_sq_mi = 2.90 | area_land_sq_mi = 2.90 | area_water_sq_mi = 0.00 | area_total_km2 = 7.52 | area_land_km2 = 7.52 | area_water_km2 = 0.00 | area_water_percent = | area_note = |population_total = 211 |population_as_of = 2020 |population_density_sq_mi = auto |population_density_km2 = auto |population_note = |population_footnotes = |timezone = PST |utc_offset = -8 |timezone_DST = PDT |utc_offset_DST = -7 |coordinates = |elevation_ft = 118 |elevation_footnotes = |postal_code_type = ZIP code |postal_code = 94922 |area_code = 707 |blank_name = FIPS code |blank_info = |blank1_name = GNIS feature ID |blank1_info = |website = }} Bodega is a census-designated place in Sonoma County, California. It is found 6.68 kilometers east of Bodega Bay, and lies 36 meters above sea level. At the 2020 census, 211 people lived there. ==References== Category:Settlements in Sonoma County, California Category:Census-designated places in California
title: Bodega, California
